General.Name: North Industries Group Red Arrow Co Ltd
General.Description: North Industries Group Red Arrow Co., Ltd manufactures and distributes internal-combustion engine components in China and internationally. It offers superhard materials, such as synthetic diamond, cubic boron nitride single crystal and polycrystalline products, composite materials, cultivated diamonds, and graphite products; special purpose vehicles and auto parts, including refrigerated and insulated vehicles, blasting equipment, transport vehicles, medical waste transfer vehicles, supporting military shelters, cylinder liners, pistons, etc.; special equipment; and other products, which includes explosion proof series, non-metallic materials, beam saber, etc. The company was formerly known as Hunan Jiangnan Red Arrow Co., Ltd. and changed its name to North Industries Group Red Arrow Co., Ltd in January 2017. North Industries Group Red Arrow Co., Ltd is headquartered in Nanyang, China.
General.Address: No. 1669 Zhongjing North Road, Nanyang, China
